file_content.text: Greetings to you! Would you like to hear a true story about the legendary Howling Tempest Gang?
Yes.
Oh--I beg your pardon! I didn't realize it was you! How exciting! Such a pleasure to make your acquaintance!
You should consider yourself honored and fortunate to have this opportunity.
Aren't I the greatest?
Indeed, I do! My master did not prepare me for the sheer measure of awe I would be required to process!
What exactly is your purpose?
Why are you doing this?
I've been assigned by my master to spread word of your many accomplishments throughout all of Raider's Cove!
Whoever put you up to all this lied to you. I'm not who you think.
Not the pirate thing again....
I thought my master told me everything, but I had no idea you were so modest!
Why, in the time since your arrival, you have already defeated the illustrious Gorro, brought fear to the Corellian Run Scoundrels and Carida Corsairs....
Even the Nova Blades have taken notice of you! My master would be most impressed.
Arrange a meeting.
You're going to take me to your master--whether you'd like to or not.
I should like to confer with your master. You will arrange an introduction.
Don't suppose there's any chance of your master coming around to chat?
You know, I wouldn't mind a face-to-face with your master so I can get to the bottom of all this.
It just so happens that my master would like very much to see you, and has authorized me to direct you to a point of contact.
Why is that impressive? What's so special about the Nova Blades?
The Nova Blades?
I'm afraid you would need to ask my master. Fortunately, I've been authorized to direct you to a rendezvous point so you can do just that.
I want to know who has you broadcasting these stories about me. Give me a name.
Your master's identity--now.
You may direct any and all questions to my master, as I have been authorized to arrange an introduction.
Oh--do be careful in your travels. Legend or no, Gorro's brother Grumm is severely displeased as to Gorro's fate.
Be wary, people of Raider's Cove--the Howling Tempest Gang has come to Rishi!
You will know true fear when you cast your eyes upon the Howling Tempest Gang!
The Republic can't touch the Howling Tempest Gang, and the Empire is afraid to even try!
Who has Kai Zykken so scared he won't even go outside? It's the Howling Tempest Gang!
The Howling Tempest Gang's a perilous pack of pirates whose prowess rivals that of the Nova Blades!
Look out, Raider's Cove! The Red Hulls are coming, and they've got an appetite for murder!
That's right, a pirate crew so vicious that they paint their ships with the blood of their victims! The Red Hulls!
Is it true that members of the Red Hulls actually eat their victims? Find out when they arrive on Rishi!
If you consider yourself easily startled or especially delicious, steer clear of the Red Hulls!
Have you heard the terrifying tale of the Red Hulls? What about you? Or you?
Greetings, gentlebeing! Let me regale you with the tale of the dread Red Hulls, and their monstrous, flesh-eating captain!
Oh, my! You are the monstrous, flesh-eating captain of the Red Hulls! What a singular pleasure to meet you!
Who programmed you to say these things about me?
I'd be happy to tell you! They're eager to meet you, after all! Big fans!
You can find them at these coordinates. But do be careful! After your magnificent duel with Gorro, there may be others out for revenge!
Excuse me! You there! Have you heard of the dread Red Hulls, and their monstrous, flesh-eating captain?
